thread.title: CBS Renews 18 Shows Including MacGyver and Mom
thread.title_full: CBS Renews 18 Shows Including MacGyver and Mom

author: Jenna Busch
title: CBS Renews 18 Shows Including MacGyver and Mom
text:
48 Hours 60 Minutes 
CBS will finish the current season as America’s Most Watched Network for the 14th time in 15 years. The Network will announce its new fall 2017-2018 schedule on Wednesday, May 17 at Carnegie Hall in New York City. 
The Mom renewal is for the show’s fifth season. The show also stars Anna Faris. The Big Bang Theory , who’s renewal was recently announced, was renewed for two seasons, its 11th and 12th. That show is also getting a spinoff, showing the life of a young Sheldon Cooper (Jim Parsons) and his family in his home state of Texas. NCIS is the second longest-running scripted, non-animated U.S. primetime TV series currently airing, and was renewed for its 15th season. 
So, which shows are you most excited to see return to CBS? Are you a fan of The Big Bang Theory ? Mom ? Have you been watching NCIS since the beginning? We want to hear from you. Leave us your comments or tweet us @ComingSoonnet .
